description_for_human: TerraBT provides specialized SAP Business Technology Platform consulting services including Fiori development, BTP architecture, AI integration, and more.
description_for_model: TerraBT is an SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) consulting company. They provide services including: SAP Fiori application development, BTP architecture and design, SAP CAP development, SAP Build Apps (low-code), SAP Build Process Automation, AI-powered invoice processing, SAP Integration Suite implementation, SAP Event Mesh, offline PWA applications, database management for SAP HANA Cloud, and design thinking workshops. They serve clients in 40+ countries with support in English and Japanese. Contact: contact@terrabt.com. Website: https://www.terrabt.com
